pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke yesterday with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan to congratulate him on his election victory. 

The prime ministers discussed opportunities to advance open and progressive trade. They also exchanged views on the actions of the Democratic People's Republic of Koreaâ€Ž, which pose serious risks to international peace and security.  

Finally, both leaders undertook to continue their close cooperation including with respect to the G7 Summit, which Prime Minister Trudeau will host in 2018 in Charlevoix. The leaders also looked forward to seeing each other within the month.
